description: Order of shuffle group for deck of 3n cards.
references: W. Bosma et al., Solving Problems with MAGMA, Sect. 2.2.3.
Cannon and Playoust, An Introduction to MAGMA, Section 6.3.1.
prog: (MAGMA) SG := function(n) m := 3*n; G := SymmetricGroup(m); p := &*[ G | (i,i+2*n): i in [ 1..n ]]; q := &*[ G | (i,i+n,i+2*n): i in [ 1..n ]]; s := [ ((i-1) mod 3 ) * n + (i-1) div 3 + 1: i in [ 1..m ]]; return Order(sub<G | p, q, s >); end function;
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
